refnamediv.refpurpose: Applies a window to an array.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Applies a given window shape to a vector stored in an array. The output is an array with the windowed vector.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: itype -- optional window type: 0 = Hamming, 1 = Hanning (von Hann) (defaults to 1).

refentry.refsect1: u Syntax kout[] window kin[][, koff, itype]

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kout[] -- output array containing the windowed output. It will be created if it does not exist.
kin[] -- input array containing the input vector.
koff -- offset to make window start at position koff (non-negative only, defaults to 0).

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para: Here is an example of the window opcode. It uses the file window.csd.
